_header: A forward knave plainly to describe
_description: John Lydgate, ‘A Satyrical Ballad against Jack Hare’ — ten 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Whiche of a bolle can pluk out the lyneng’

BodLauMis683.First Lines:
A ffroward knave pleynly to descryveand a sloggard schortly to
                    declare…
BodLauMis683.Last Lines:
…with on wasshen handis not lased his doubletout of a bolle to
                    plukke out the lynyng

A ffroward knave pleynly to
                    declaredescrybeAnd asluggard shortly to
                    declare…
BLLan699.Last Lines:

                    out the lynyng
